short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create and manage bookmarks for specific pages in PDF documents

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PDF Bookmark Manager – Effortless PDF Navigation!

Looking for a better way to manage your place in lengthy PDFs? PDF Bookmark Manager makes it easy to save and organize page-specific bookmarks, perfect for students, researchers, and professionals who work with PDFs daily.

Features:

📄 Page-Specific Bookmarks: Save individual pages in any PDF, whether online or offline.
📝 Custom Titles: Label bookmarks with your own titles, so key info is just a click away.
🚀 Quick Navigation: Instantly jump to any bookmarked page without scrolling.
📚 Organize by Document: Group bookmarks by file to keep your resources organized.
🔒 Offline & Secure: All data is stored locally on your device—no accounts or online storage needed.
Try the free option for up to 5 bookmarks, or upgrade for just $4.99 to unlock unlimited bookmarks and enjoy lifetime access, including all future updates.

Buy once, own forever! Install PDF Bookmark Manager and transform your PDF experience today!
